mapper.sql: select pl.*, o.cname AS applyDeptName, o.code AS applyDeptCode, v.mfrs_name as mfrsName, v.mi_code, v.hit_code, v.pur_price, v.sale_price, v.certificate_code FROM purconfirm_list pl LEFT JOIN purconfirm p on p.bill_id=pl.bill_id left JOIN sys_org o on pl.apply_dept_id = o.id LEFT JOIN v_pro_hos_goodsinfo v on pl.hos_goods_id = v.id and v.prov_id = p.prov_id
mapper.insert:
insert into purconfirm_list (id,pid,bill_id,row_number,apply_dept_id,pur_bill_id,pur_bill_rownum,pur_bill_date,apply_bill_id, apply_row_number,prov_goods_id,goods_gg,goods_mrfs_id,made,hos_goods_id,hos_goods_code,hos_goods_name,prov_goods_erp_code, prov_goods_erp_name,prov_goods_erp_price,hos_price,hos_unit,hos_scale,hos_apply_qty,apply_qty,hos_pur_qty,pur_qty,unit_qty, qty,qr_tax,qr_tax_price,qr_tax_amount,qr_amount,qr_tax_money,send_qty,status,apply_date,es_arrival_date,unique_kind,unit, yg_bill_id,version,last_update_datetime) values
(UUID(),#{item.pid},#{item.billId},#{item.rowNumber},#{item.applyDeptId},#{item.purBillId},#{item.purBillRownum},#{item.purBillDate},#{item.applyBillId}, #{item.applyRowNumber},#{item.provGoodsId},#{item.goodsGg},#{item.goodsMrfsId},#{item.made},#{item.hosGoodsId},#{item.hosGoodsCode},#{item.hosGoodsName},#{item.provGoodsErpCode} ,#{item.provGoodsErpName},#{item.provGoodsErpPrice},#{item.hosPrice},#{item.hosUnit},#{item.hosScale},#{item.hosApplyQty},#{item.applyQty},#{item.hosPurQty},#{item.purQty} ,#{item.unitQty},#{item.qty},#{item.qrTax},#{item.qrTaxPrice},#{item.qrTaxAmount},#{item.qrAmount},#{item.qrTaxMoney},0,0,#{item.applyDate},#{item.esArrivalDate},#{item.uniqueKind}, #{item.unit},#{item.ygBillId},1, sysdate() )

insert into purconfirm_list (id,pid,bill_id,row_number,apply_dept_id,pur_bill_id,pur_bill_rownum,pur_bill_date,apply_bill_id, apply_row_number,prov_goods_id,goods_gg,goods_mrfs_id,made,hos_goods_id,hos_goods_code,hos_goods_name,prov_goods_erp_code, prov_goods_erp_name,prov_goods_erp_price,hos_price,hos_unit,hos_scale,hos_apply_qty,apply_qty,hos_pur_qty,pur_qty,unit_qty, qty,qr_tax,qr_tax_price,qr_tax_amount,qr_amount,qr_tax_money,send_qty,status,apply_date,es_arrival_date,unique_kind,unit, yg_bill_id,version,last_update_datetime)
(select sys_guid(),#{item.pid},#{item.billId},#{item.rowNumber},#{item.applyDeptId},#{item.purBillId},#{item.purBillRownum},#{item.purBillDate},#{item.applyBillId}, #{item.applyRowNumber},#{item.provGoodsId},#{item.goodsGg},#{item.goodsMrfsId},#{item.made},#{item.hosGoodsId},#{item.hosGoodsCode},#{item.hosGoodsName},#{item.provGoodsErpCode} ,#{item.provGoodsErpName},#{item.provGoodsErpPrice},#{item.hosPrice},#{item.hosUnit},#{item.hosScale},#{item.hosApplyQty},#{item.applyQty},#{item.hosPurQty},#{item.purQty} ,#{item.unitQty},#{item.qty},#{item.qrTax},#{item.qrTaxPrice},#{item.qrTaxAmount},#{item.qrAmount},#{item.qrTaxMoney},0,0,#{item.applyDate},#{item.esArrivalDate},#{item.uniqueKind}, #{item.unit},#{item.ygBillId},1, sysdate from dual )
mapper.update:
update purconfirm_list
pid = #{pid}, bill_id = #{billId}, row_number = #{rowNumber}, apply_dept_id = #{applyDeptId}, pur_bill_id = #{purBillId}, pur_bill_rownum = #{purBillRownum}, pur_bill_date = #{purBillDate}, apply_bill_id = #{applyBillId}, apply_row_number = #{applyRowNumber}, prov_goods_id = #{provGoodsId}, goods_gg = #{goodsGg}, goods_mrfs_id = #{goodsMrfsId}, made = #{made}, hos_goods_id = #{hosGoodsId}, hos_goods_code = #{hosGoodsCode}, hos_goods_name = #{hosGoodsName}, prov_goods_erp_code = #{provGoodsErpCode}, prov_goods_erp_name = #{provGoodsErpName}, prov_goods_erp_price = #{provGoodsErpPrice}, hos_price = #{hosPrice}, hos_unit = #{hosUnit}, hos_scale = #{hosScale}, hos_apply_qty = #{hosApplyQty}, apply_qty = #{applyQty}, hos_pur_qty = #{hosPurQty}, pur_qty = #{purQty}, unit_qty = #{unitQty}, qty = #{qty}, qr_tax = #{qrTax}, qr_tax_price = #{qrTaxPrice}, qr_tax_amount = #{qrTaxAmount}, qr_amount = #{qrAmount}, qr_tax_money = #{qrTaxMoney}, apply_date = #{applyDate}, es_arrival_date = #{esArrivalDate}, status = #{status}, send_qty = #{sendQty}, unique_kind = #{uniqueKind}, unit = #{unit}, yg_bill_id = #{ygBillId},
last_update_datetime = sysdate(),
last_update_datetime = sysdate,
version=version+1
and id = #{id} and version= #{version}
